intent_template: For {description}, can you instead add {description2} to my cart?
intent: For each item added to cart in the video, can you instead add the items that were second to the left in the same row to my cart?
intermediate_intent: What were the items that were second to the left in the same row of the items added to cart in the video?

instantiation_dict.description: each item added to cart in the video
instantiation_dict.description2: the items that were second to the left in the same row

must_include: TCL 10L, Unlocked Android Smartphone with 6.53" FHD + LCD Display, 48MP Quad Rear Camera System, 64GB+6GB RAM, 4000mAh Battery
iPhone 13 Pro Max Case, Neon Turtle iPhone 13 Pro Max Cases, Tempered Glass Back+Soft Silicone TPU Shock Protective Case for Apple iPhone 13 Pro Max
